titles.title: To provide for adjustment of status for aliens who became eligible for such adjustment based on a diversity immigrant visa available for fiscal year 1997 or 1998, but whose eligibility expired due to paperwork processing delays.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 8/6/1998--Introduced. Provides for the adjustment of status to permanent resident of certain diversity immigrant visa applicants who were adversely affected by processing delays.
